actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to allow greater participation by the State governments in the classification of public land within the boundaries of the affected State.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Congress and the Secretaries of Agriculture and the Interior from designating any additional Federal lands for inclusion in a wilderness classification without the consent of the Governor and the legislature of the affected States.

titles.title: A bill to allow greater participation by the State governments in the classification of public land within the boundaries of the affected State.
